#labels Procedures
Increments  the device reference count.

Interface to OpenCL [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/ clRetainDevice].

== Interface ==

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clRetainDevice(device, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_device_id), intent(inout) :: device
  integer,            intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clRetainDevice
</code>
